body_html:
It looks like for cuda 9 support we need to update NCCL version to get this commit:
NVIDIA/nccl@29a1a91

I think you can try that with cuda 9 by changing the workspace.bzl file:

tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl

Line 618 in 084d29e

"http://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/nvidia/nccl/archive/ccfc4567dc3e2a37fb42cfbc64d10eb526e7da7b.tar.gz",

and update the url, sha256, and strip_prefix. (url and strip prefix should refer to the new commit, sha256 is the hash of the downloaded archive)

body:
It looks like for cuda 9 support we need to update NCCL version to get this commit:
  https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl/commit/29a1a916dc14bb2c00feed3d4820d51fa85be1e6

I think you can try that with cuda 9 by changing the workspace.bzl file:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/084d29e67a72e369958c18ae6abfe2752fcddcbf/tensorflow/workspace.bzl#L618

and update the url, sha256, and strip_prefix.  (url and strip prefix should refer to the new commit, sha256 is the hash of the downloaded archive)
